00034 /* Possible Improvements:
00035  * - add fresnel terms
00036  * - adapt Rd table to scale, now with small scale there are a lot of misses?
00037  * - possible interesting method: perform sss on all samples in the tree,
00038  *   and then use those values interpolated somehow later. can also do this
00039  *   filtering on demand for speed. since we are doing things in screen
00040  *   space now there is an exact correspondence
00041  * - avoid duplicate shading (filtering points in advance, irradiance cache
00042  *   like lookup?)
00043  * - lower resolution samples
00044  */

00080 /* Generic Multiple Scattering API */
00081 
00082 /* Relevant papers:
00083  * [1] A Practical Model for Subsurface Light Transport
00084  * [2] A Rapid Hierarchical Rendering Technique for Translucent Materials
00085  * [3] Efficient Rendering of Local Subsurface Scattering
00086  * [4] Implementing a skin BSSRDF (or several...)
00087  */
00088 
00089 /* Defines */
00090 
00091 #define RD_TABLE_RANGE      100.0f
00092 #define RD_TABLE_RANGE_2    10000.0f
00093 #define RD_TABLE_SIZE       10000
00094 
00095 #define MAX_OCTREE_NODE_POINTS  8
00096 #define MAX_OCTREE_DEPTH        15

00098 /* Struct Definitions */

00100 struct ScatterSettings {
00101     float eta;      /* index of refraction */
00102     float sigma_a;  /* absorption coefficient */
00103     float sigma_s_; /* reduced scattering coefficient */
00104     float sigma_t_; /* reduced extinction coefficient */
00105     float sigma;    /* effective extinction coefficient */
00106     float Fdr;      /* diffuse fresnel reflectance */
00107     float D;        /* diffusion constant */
00108     float A;
00109     float alpha_;   /* reduced albedo */
00110     float zr;       /* distance of virtual lightsource above surface */
00111     float zv;       /* distance of virtual lightsource below surface */
00112     float ld;       /* mean free path */
00113     float ro;       /* diffuse reflectance */
00114     float color;
00115     float invsigma_t_;
00116     float frontweight;
00117     float backweight;
00118 
00119     float *tableRd;  /* lookup table to avoid computing Rd */
00120     float *tableRd2; /* lookup table to avoid computing Rd for bigger values */
00121 };
00122 
00123 typedef struct ScatterPoint {
00124     float co[3];
00125     float rad[3];
00126     float area;
00127     int back;
00128 } ScatterPoint;

00131     float co[3];
00132     float rad[3];
00133     float backrad[3];
00134     float area, backarea;
00135 
00136     int totpoint;
00137     ScatterPoint *points;
00138 
00139     float split[3];
00140     struct ScatterNode *child[8];
00141 } ScatterNode;

00144     MemArena *arena;

00147     float error, scale;

00149     ScatterNode *root;

00152     ScatterPoint **tmppoints;
00153     int totpoint;
00154     float min[3], max[3];
00155 };

00157 typedef struct ScatterResult {
00158     float rad[3];
00159     float backrad[3];
00160     float rdsum[3];
00161     float backrdsum[3];
00162 } ScatterResult;
00163 
00164 /* Functions for BSSRDF reparametrization in to more intuitive parameters,
00165  * see [2] section 4 for more info. */
00166 
00167 static float f_Rd(float alpha_, float A, float ro)
00168 {
00169     float sq;
00170 
00171     sq= sqrt(3.0f*(1.0f - alpha_));
00172     return (alpha_/2.0f)*(1.0f + expf((-4.0f/3.0f)*A*sq))*expf(-sq) - ro;
00173 }
00174 
00175 static float compute_reduced_albedo(ScatterSettings *ss)
00176 {
00177     const float tolerance= 1e-8;
00178     const int max_iteration_count= 20;
00179     float d, fsub, xn_1= 0.0f , xn= 1.0f, fxn, fxn_1;
00180     int i;
00181 
00182     /* use secant method to compute reduced albedo using Rd function inverse
00183      * with a given reflectance */
00184     fxn= f_Rd(xn, ss->A, ss->ro);
00185     fxn_1= f_Rd(xn_1, ss->A, ss->ro);
00186 
00187     for (i= 0; i < max_iteration_count; i++) {
00188         fsub= (fxn - fxn_1);
00189         if (fabsf(fsub) < tolerance)
00190             break;
00191         d= ((xn - xn_1)/fsub)*fxn;
00192         if (fabsf(d) < tolerance)
00193             break;
00194 
00195         xn_1= xn;
00196         fxn_1= fxn;
00197         xn= xn - d;
00198 
00199         if (xn > 1.0f) xn= 1.0f;
00200         if (xn_1 > 1.0f) xn_1= 1.0f;
00201         
00202         fxn= f_Rd(xn, ss->A, ss->ro);
00203     }
00204 
00205     /* avoid division by zero later */
00206     if (xn <= 0.0f)
00207         xn= 0.00001f;
00208 
00209     return xn;
00210 }
00211 
00212 /* Exponential falloff functions */
00213 
00214 static float Rd_rsquare(ScatterSettings *ss, float rr)
00215 {
00216     float sr, sv, Rdr, Rdv;
00217 
00218     sr= sqrt(rr + ss->zr*ss->zr);
00219     sv= sqrt(rr + ss->zv*ss->zv);
00220 
00221     Rdr= ss->zr*(1.0f + ss->sigma*sr)*expf(-ss->sigma*sr)/(sr*sr*sr);
00222     Rdv= ss->zv*(1.0f + ss->sigma*sv)*expf(-ss->sigma*sv)/(sv*sv*sv);
00223 
00224     return /*ss->alpha_*/(1.0f/(4.0f*(float)M_PI))*(Rdr + Rdv);
00225 }
00226 
00227 static float Rd(ScatterSettings *ss, float r)
00228 {
00229     return Rd_rsquare(ss, r*r);
00230 }
00231 
00232 /* table lookups for Rd. this avoids expensive exp calls. we use two
00233  * separate tables as well for lower and higher numbers to improve
00234  * precision, since the number are poorly distributed because we do
00235  * a lookup with the squared distance for smaller distances, saving
00236  * another sqrt. */
00237 
00238 static void approximate_Rd_rgb(ScatterSettings **ss, float rr, float *rd)
00239 {
00240     float indexf, t, idxf;
00241     int index;
00242 
00243     if (rr > (RD_TABLE_RANGE_2*RD_TABLE_RANGE_2));
00244     else if (rr > RD_TABLE_RANGE) {
00245         rr= sqrt(rr);
00246         indexf= rr*(RD_TABLE_SIZE/RD_TABLE_RANGE_2);
00247         index= (int)indexf;
00248         idxf= (float)index;
00249         t= indexf - idxf;
00250 
00251         if (index >= 0 && index < RD_TABLE_SIZE) {
00252             rd[0]= (ss[0]->tableRd2[index]*(1-t) + ss[0]->tableRd2[index+1]*t);
00253             rd[1]= (ss[1]->tableRd2[index]*(1-t) + ss[1]->tableRd2[index+1]*t);
00254             rd[2]= (ss[2]->tableRd2[index]*(1-t) + ss[2]->tableRd2[index+1]*t);
00255             return;
00256         }
00257     }
00258     else {
00259         indexf= rr*(RD_TABLE_SIZE/RD_TABLE_RANGE);
00260         index= (int)indexf;
00261         idxf= (float)index;
00262         t= indexf - idxf;
00263 
00264         if (index >= 0 && index < RD_TABLE_SIZE) {
00265             rd[0]= (ss[0]->tableRd[index]*(1-t) + ss[0]->tableRd[index+1]*t);
00266             rd[1]= (ss[1]->tableRd[index]*(1-t) + ss[1]->tableRd[index+1]*t);
00267             rd[2]= (ss[2]->tableRd[index]*(1-t) + ss[2]->tableRd[index+1]*t);
00268             return;
00269         }
00270     }
00271 
00272     /* fallback to slow Rd computation */
00273     rd[0]= Rd_rsquare(ss[0], rr);
00274     rd[1]= Rd_rsquare(ss[1], rr);
00275     rd[2]= Rd_rsquare(ss[2], rr);
00276 }
00277 
00278 static void build_Rd_table(ScatterSettings *ss)
00279 {
00280     float r;
00281     int i, size = RD_TABLE_SIZE+1;
00282 
00283     ss->tableRd= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float)*size, "scatterTableRd");
00284     ss->tableRd2= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float)*size, "scatterTableRd");
00285 
00286     for (i= 0; i < size; i++) {
00287         r= i*(RD_TABLE_RANGE/RD_TABLE_SIZE);
00288         /*if (r < ss->invsigma_t_*ss->invsigma_t_)
00289             r= ss->invsigma_t_*ss->invsigma_t_;*/
00290         ss->tableRd[i]= Rd(ss, sqrt(r));
00291 
00292         r= i*(RD_TABLE_RANGE_2/RD_TABLE_SIZE);
00293         /*if (r < ss->invsigma_t_)
00294             r= ss->invsigma_t_;*/
00295         ss->tableRd2[i]= Rd(ss, r);
00296     }
00297 }
00298 
00299 ScatterSettings *scatter_settings_new(float refl, float radius, float ior, float reflfac, float frontweight, float backweight)
00300 {
00301     ScatterSettings *ss;
00302     
00303     ss= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ScatterSettings), "ScatterSettings");
00304 
00305     /* see [1] and [3] for these formulas */
00306     ss->eta= ior;
00307     ss->Fdr= -1.440f/ior*ior + 0.710f/ior + 0.668f + 0.0636f*ior;
00308     ss->A= (1.0f + ss->Fdr)/(1.0f - ss->Fdr);
00309     ss->ld= radius;
00310     ss->ro= MIN2(refl, 0.999f);
00311     ss->color= ss->ro*reflfac + (1.0f-reflfac);
00312 
00313     ss->alpha_= compute_reduced_albedo(ss);
00314 
00315     ss->sigma= 1.0f/ss->ld;
00316     ss->sigma_t_= ss->sigma/sqrtf(3.0f*(1.0f - ss->alpha_));
00317     ss->sigma_s_= ss->alpha_*ss->sigma_t_;
00318     ss->sigma_a= ss->sigma_t_ - ss->sigma_s_;
00319 
00320     ss->D= 1.0f/(3.0f*ss->sigma_t_);
00321 
00322     ss->zr= 1.0f/ss->sigma_t_;
00323     ss->zv= ss->zr + 4.0f*ss->A*ss->D;
00324 
00325     ss->invsigma_t_= 1.0f/ss->sigma_t_;
00326 
00327     ss->frontweight= frontweight;
00328     ss->backweight= backweight;
00329 
00330     /* precompute a table of Rd values for quick lookup */
00331     build_Rd_table(ss);
00332 
00333     return ss;
00334 }
00335 
00336 void scatter_settings_free(ScatterSettings *ss)
00337 {
00338     MEM_freeN(ss->tableRd);
00339     MEM_freeN(ss->tableRd2);
00340     MEM_freeN(ss);
00341 }
00342 
00343 /* Hierarchical method as in [2]. */
00344 
00345 /* traversal */
00346 
00347 #define SUBNODE_INDEX(co, split) \
00348     ((co[0]>=split[0]) + (co[1]>=split[1])*2 + (co[2]>=split[2])*4)
00349     
00350 static void add_radiance(ScatterTree *tree, float *frontrad, float *backrad, float area, float backarea, float rr, ScatterResult *result)
00351 {
00352     float rd[3], frontrd[3], backrd[3];
00353 
00354     approximate_Rd_rgb(tree->ss, rr, rd);
00355 
00356     if (frontrad && area) {
00357         frontrd[0] = rd[0]*area;
00358         frontrd[1] = rd[1]*area;
00359         frontrd[2] = rd[2]*area;
00360 
00361         result->rad[0] += frontrad[0]*frontrd[0];
00362         result->rad[1] += frontrad[1]*frontrd[1];
00363         result->rad[2] += frontrad[2]*frontrd[2];
00364 
00365         result->rdsum[0] += frontrd[0];
00366         result->rdsum[1] += frontrd[1];
00367         result->rdsum[2] += frontrd[2];
00368     }
00369     if (backrad && backarea) {
00370         backrd[0] = rd[0]*backarea;
00371         backrd[1] = rd[1]*backarea;
00372         backrd[2] = rd[2]*backarea;
00373 
00374         result->backrad[0] += backrad[0]*backrd[0];
00375         result->backrad[1] += backrad[1]*backrd[1];
00376         result->backrad[2] += backrad[2]*backrd[2];
00377 
00378         result->backrdsum[0] += backrd[0];
00379         result->backrdsum[1] += backrd[1];
00380         result->backrdsum[2] += backrd[2];
00381     }
00382 }
00383 
00384 static void traverse_octree(ScatterTree *tree, ScatterNode *node, float *co, int self, ScatterResult *result)
00385 {
00386     float sub[3], dist;
00387     int i, index = 0;
00388 
00389     if (node->totpoint > 0) {
00390         /* leaf - add radiance from all samples */
00391         for (i=0; i<node->totpoint; i++) {
00392             ScatterPoint *p= &node->points[i];
00393 
00394             sub_v3_v3v3(sub, co, p->co);
00395             dist= dot_v3v3(sub, sub);
00396 
00397             if (p->back)
00398                 add_radiance(tree, NULL, p->rad, 0.0f, p->area, dist, result);
00399             else
00400                 add_radiance(tree, p->rad, NULL, p->area, 0.0f, dist, result);
00401         }
00402     }
00403     else {
00404         /* branch */
00405         if (self)
00406             index = SUBNODE_INDEX(co, node->split);
00407 
00408         for (i=0; i<8; i++) {
00409             if (node->child[i]) {
00410                 ScatterNode *subnode= node->child[i];
00411 
00412                 if (self && index == i) {
00413                     /* always traverse node containing the point */
00414                     traverse_octree(tree, subnode, co, 1, result);
00415                 }
00416                 else {
00417                     /* decide subnode traversal based on maximum solid angle */
00418                     sub_v3_v3v3(sub, co, subnode->co);
00419                     dist= dot_v3v3(sub, sub);
00420 
00421                     /* actually area/dist > error, but this avoids division */
00422                     if (subnode->area+subnode->backarea>tree->error*dist) {
00423                         traverse_octree(tree, subnode, co, 0, result);
00424                     }
00425                     else {
00426                         add_radiance(tree, subnode->rad, subnode->backrad,
00427                             subnode->area, subnode->backarea, dist, result);
00428                     }
00429                 }
00430             }
00431         }
00432     }
00433 }
00434 
00435 static void compute_radiance(ScatterTree *tree, float *co, float *rad)
00436 {
00437     ScatterResult result;
00438     float rdsum[3], backrad[3], backrdsum[3];
00439 
00440     memset(&result, 0, sizeof(result));
00441 
00442     traverse_octree(tree, tree->root, co, 1, &result);
00443 
00444     /* the original paper doesn't do this, but we normalize over the
00445      * sampled area and multiply with the reflectance. this is because
00446      * our point samples are incomplete, there are no samples on parts
00447      * of the mesh not visible from the camera. this can not only make
00448      * it darker, but also lead to ugly color shifts */
00449 
00450     mul_v3_fl(result.rad, tree->ss[0]->frontweight);
00451     mul_v3_fl(result.backrad, tree->ss[0]->backweight);
00452 
00453     copy_v3_v3(rad, result.rad);
00454     add_v3_v3v3(backrad, result.rad, result.backrad);
00455 
00456     copy_v3_v3(rdsum, result.rdsum);
00457     add_v3_v3v3(backrdsum, result.rdsum, result.backrdsum);
00458 
00459     if (rdsum[0] > 1e-16f) rad[0]= tree->ss[0]->color*rad[0]/rdsum[0];
00460     if (rdsum[1] > 1e-16f) rad[1]= tree->ss[1]->color*rad[1]/rdsum[1];
00461     if (rdsum[2] > 1e-16f) rad[2]= tree->ss[2]->color*rad[2]/rdsum[2];
00462 
00463     if (backrdsum[0] > 1e-16f) backrad[0]= tree->ss[0]->color*backrad[0]/backrdsum[0];
00464     if (backrdsum[1] > 1e-16f) backrad[1]= tree->ss[1]->color*backrad[1]/backrdsum[1];
00465     if (backrdsum[2] > 1e-16f) backrad[2]= tree->ss[2]->color*backrad[2]/backrdsum[2];
00466 
00467     rad[0]= MAX2(rad[0], backrad[0]);
00468     rad[1]= MAX2(rad[1], backrad[1]);
00469     rad[2]= MAX2(rad[2], backrad[2]);
00470 }
00471 
00472 /* building */
00473 
00474 static void sum_leaf_radiance(ScatterTree *UNUSED(tree), ScatterNode *node)
00475 {
00476     ScatterPoint *p;
00477     float rad, totrad= 0.0f, inv;
00478     int i;
00479 
00480     node->co[0]= node->co[1]= node->co[2]= 0.0;
00481     node->rad[0]= node->rad[1]= node->rad[2]= 0.0;
00482     node->backrad[0]= node->backrad[1]= node->backrad[2]= 0.0;
00483 
00484     /* compute total rad, rad weighted average position,
00485      * and total area */
00486     for (i=0; i<node->totpoint; i++) {
00487         p= &node->points[i];
00488 
00489         rad= p->area*fabsf(p->rad[0] + p->rad[1] + p->rad[2]);
00490         totrad += rad;
00491 
00492         node->co[0] += rad*p->co[0];
00493         node->co[1] += rad*p->co[1];
00494         node->co[2] += rad*p->co[2];
00495 
00496         if (p->back) {
00497             node->backrad[0] += p->rad[0]*p->area;
00498             node->backrad[1] += p->rad[1]*p->area;
00499             node->backrad[2] += p->rad[2]*p->area;
00500 
00501             node->backarea += p->area;
00502         }
00503         else {
00504             node->rad[0] += p->rad[0]*p->area;
00505             node->rad[1] += p->rad[1]*p->area;
00506             node->rad[2] += p->rad[2]*p->area;
00507 
00508             node->area += p->area;
00509         }
00510     }
00511 
00512     if (node->area > 1e-16f) {
00513         inv= 1.0f/node->area;
00514         node->rad[0] *= inv;
00515         node->rad[1] *= inv;
00516         node->rad[2] *= inv;
00517     }
00518     if (node->backarea > 1e-16f) {
00519         inv= 1.0f/node->backarea;
00520         node->backrad[0] *= inv;
00521         node->backrad[1] *= inv;
00522         node->backrad[2] *= inv;
00523     }
00524 
00525     if (totrad > 1e-16f) {
00526         inv= 1.0f/totrad;
00527         node->co[0] *= inv;
00528         node->co[1] *= inv;
00529         node->co[2] *= inv;
00530     }
00531     else {
00532         /* make sure that if radiance is 0.0f, we still have these points in
00533          * the tree at a good position, they count for rdsum too */
00534         for (i=0; i<node->totpoint; i++) {
00535             p= &node->points[i];
00536 
00537             node->co[0] += p->co[0];
00538             node->co[1] += p->co[1];
00539             node->co[2] += p->co[2];
00540         }
00541 
00542         node->co[0] /= node->totpoint;
00543         node->co[1] /= node->totpoint;
00544         node->co[2] /= node->totpoint;
00545     }
00546 }
00547 
00548 static void sum_branch_radiance(ScatterTree *UNUSED(tree), ScatterNode *node)
00549 {
00550     ScatterNode *subnode;
00551     float rad, totrad= 0.0f, inv;
00552     int i, totnode;
00553 
00554     node->co[0]= node->co[1]= node->co[2]= 0.0;
00555     node->rad[0]= node->rad[1]= node->rad[2]= 0.0;
00556     node->backrad[0]= node->backrad[1]= node->backrad[2]= 0.0;
00557 
00558     /* compute total rad, rad weighted average position,
00559      * and total area */
00560     for (i=0; i<8; i++) {
00561         if (node->child[i] == NULL)
00562             continue;
00563 
00564         subnode= node->child[i];
00565 
00566         rad= subnode->area*fabsf(subnode->rad[0] + subnode->rad[1] + subnode->rad[2]);
00567         rad += subnode->backarea*fabsf(subnode->backrad[0] + subnode->backrad[1] + subnode->backrad[2]);
00568         totrad += rad;
00569 
00570         node->co[0] += rad*subnode->co[0];
00571         node->co[1] += rad*subnode->co[1];
00572         node->co[2] += rad*subnode->co[2];
00573 
00574         node->rad[0] += subnode->rad[0]*subnode->area;
00575         node->rad[1] += subnode->rad[1]*subnode->area;
00576         node->rad[2] += subnode->rad[2]*subnode->area;
00577 
00578         node->backrad[0] += subnode->backrad[0]*subnode->backarea;
00579         node->backrad[1] += subnode->backrad[1]*subnode->backarea;
00580         node->backrad[2] += subnode->backrad[2]*subnode->backarea;
00581 
00582         node->area += subnode->area;
00583         node->backarea += subnode->backarea;
00584     }
00585 
00586     if (node->area > 1e-16f) {
00587         inv= 1.0f/node->area;
00588         node->rad[0] *= inv;
00589         node->rad[1] *= inv;
00590         node->rad[2] *= inv;
00591     }
00592     if (node->backarea > 1e-16f) {
00593         inv= 1.0f/node->backarea;
00594         node->backrad[0] *= inv;
00595         node->backrad[1] *= inv;
00596         node->backrad[2] *= inv;
00597     }
00598 
00599     if (totrad > 1e-16f) {
00600         inv= 1.0f/totrad;
00601         node->co[0] *= inv;
00602         node->co[1] *= inv;
00603         node->co[2] *= inv;
00604     }
00605     else {
00606         /* make sure that if radiance is 0.0f, we still have these points in
00607          * the tree at a good position, they count for rdsum too */
00608         totnode= 0;
00609 
00610         for (i=0; i<8; i++) {
00611             if (node->child[i]) {
00612                 subnode= node->child[i];
00613 
00614                 node->co[0] += subnode->co[0];
00615                 node->co[1] += subnode->co[1];
00616                 node->co[2] += subnode->co[2];
00617 
00618                 totnode++;
00619             }
00620         }
00621 
00622         node->co[0] /= totnode;
00623         node->co[1] /= totnode;
00624         node->co[2] /= totnode;
00625     }
00626 }
00627 
00628 static void sum_radiance(ScatterTree *tree, ScatterNode *node)
00629 {
00630     if (node->totpoint > 0) {
00631         sum_leaf_radiance(tree, node);
00632     }
00633     else {
00634         int i;
00635 
00636         for (i=0; i<8; i++)
00637             if (node->child[i])
00638                 sum_radiance(tree, node->child[i]);
00639 
00640         sum_branch_radiance(tree, node);
00641     }
00642 }
00643 
00644 static void subnode_middle(int i, float *mid, float *subsize, float *submid)
00645 {
00646     int x= i & 1, y= i & 2, z= i & 4;
00647 
00648     submid[0]= mid[0] + ((x)? subsize[0]: -subsize[0]);
00649     submid[1]= mid[1] + ((y)? subsize[1]: -subsize[1]);
00650     submid[2]= mid[2] + ((z)? subsize[2]: -subsize[2]);
00651 }
00652 
00653 static void create_octree_node(ScatterTree *tree, ScatterNode *node, float *mid, float *size, ScatterPoint **refpoints, int depth)
00654 {
00655     ScatterNode *subnode;
00656     ScatterPoint **subrefpoints, **tmppoints= tree->tmppoints;
00657     int index, nsize[8], noffset[8], i, subco, usednodes, usedi;
00658     float submid[3], subsize[3];
00659 
00660     /* stopping condition */
00661     if (node->totpoint <= MAX_OCTREE_NODE_POINTS || depth == MAX_OCTREE_DEPTH) {
00662         for (i=0; i<node->totpoint; i++)
00663             node->points[i]= *(refpoints[i]);
00664 
00665         return;
00666     }
00667 
00668     subsize[0]= size[0]*0.5f;
00669     subsize[1]= size[1]*0.5f;
00670     subsize[2]= size[2]*0.5f;
00671 
00672     node->split[0]= mid[0];
00673     node->split[1]= mid[1];
00674     node->split[2]= mid[2];
00675 
00676     memset(nsize, 0, sizeof(nsize));
00677     memset(noffset, 0, sizeof(noffset));
00678 
00679     /* count points in subnodes */
00680     for (i=0; i<node->totpoint; i++) {
00681         index= SUBNODE_INDEX(refpoints[i]->co, node->split);
00682         tmppoints[i]= refpoints[i];
00683         nsize[index]++;
00684     }
00685 
00686     /* here we check if only one subnode is used. if this is the case, we don't
00687      * create a new node, but rather call this function again, with different
00688      * size and middle position for the same node. */
00689     for (usedi=0, usednodes=0, i=0; i<8; i++) {
00690         if (nsize[i]) {
00691             usednodes++;
00692             usedi = i;
00693         }
00694         if (i != 0)
00695             noffset[i]= noffset[i-1]+nsize[i-1];
00696     }
00697     
00698     if (usednodes<=1) {
00699         subnode_middle(usedi, mid, subsize, submid);
00700         create_octree_node(tree, node, submid, subsize, refpoints, depth+1);
00701         return;
00702     }
00703 
00704     /* reorder refpoints by subnode */
00705     for (i=0; i<node->totpoint; i++) {
00706         index= SUBNODE_INDEX(tmppoints[i]->co, node->split);
00707         refpoints[noffset[index]]= tmppoints[i];
00708         noffset[index]++;
00709     }
00710 
00711     /* create subnodes */
00712     for (subco=0, i=0; i<8; subco+=nsize[i], i++) {
00713         if (nsize[i] > 0) {
00714             subnode= BLI_memarena_alloc(tree->arena, sizeof(ScatterNode));
00715             node->child[i]= subnode;
00716             subnode->points= node->points + subco;
00717             subnode->totpoint= nsize[i];
00718             subrefpoints= refpoints + subco;
00719 
00720             subnode_middle(i, mid, subsize, submid);
00721 
00722             create_octree_node(tree, subnode, submid, subsize, subrefpoints,
00723                 depth+1);
00724         }
00725         else
00726             node->child[i]= NULL;
00727     }
00728 
00729     node->points= NULL;
00730     node->totpoint= 0;
00731 }
00732 
00733 /* public functions */
00734 
00735 ScatterTree *scatter_tree_new(ScatterSettings *ss[3], float scale, float error,
00736     float (*co)[3], float (*color)[3], float *area, int totpoint)
00737 {
00738     ScatterTree *tree;
00739     ScatterPoint *points, **refpoints;
00740     int i;
00741 
00742     /* allocate tree */
00743     tree= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ScatterTree), "ScatterTree");
00744     tree->scale= scale;
00745     tree->error= error;
00746     tree->totpoint= totpoint;
00747 
00748     tree->ss[0]= ss[0];
00749     tree->ss[1]= ss[1];
00750     tree->ss[2]= ss[2];
00751 
00752     points= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ScatterPoint)*totpoint, "ScatterPoints");
00753     refpoints= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ScatterPoint*)*totpoint, "ScatterRefPoints");
00754 
00755     tree->points= points;
00756     tree->refpoints= refpoints;
00757 
00758     /* build points */
00759     INIT_MINMAX(tree->min, tree->max);
00760 
00761     for (i=0; i<totpoint; i++) {
00762         copy_v3_v3(points[i].co, co[i]);
00763         copy_v3_v3(points[i].rad, color[i]);
00764         points[i].area= fabsf(area[i])/(tree->scale*tree->scale);
00765         points[i].back= (area[i] < 0.0f);
00766 
00767         mul_v3_fl(points[i].co, 1.0f/tree->scale);
00768         DO_MINMAX(points[i].co, tree->min, tree->max);
00769 
00770         refpoints[i]= points + i;
00771     }
00772 
00773     return tree;
00774 }
00775 
00776 void scatter_tree_build(ScatterTree *tree)
00777 {
00778     ScatterPoint *newpoints, **tmppoints;
00779     float mid[3], size[3];
00780     int totpoint= tree->totpoint;
00781 
00782     newpoints= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ScatterPoint)*totpoint, "ScatterPoints");
00783     tmppoints= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ScatterPoint*)*totpoint, "ScatterTmpPoints");
00784     tree->tmppoints= tmppoints;
00785 
00786     tree->arena= BLI_memarena_new(0x8000 * sizeof(ScatterNode), "sss tree arena");
00787     BLI_memarena_use_calloc(tree->arena);
00788 
00789     /* build tree */
00790     tree->root= BLI_memarena_alloc(tree->arena, sizeof(ScatterNode));
00791     tree->root->points= newpoints;
00792     tree->root->totpoint= totpoint;
00793 
00794     mid[0]= (tree->min[0]+tree->max[0])*0.5f;
00795     mid[1]= (tree->min[1]+tree->max[1])*0.5f;
00796     mid[2]= (tree->min[2]+tree->max[2])*0.5f;
00797 
00798     size[0]= (tree->max[0]-tree->min[0])*0.5f;
00799     size[1]= (tree->max[1]-tree->min[1])*0.5f;
00800     size[2]= (tree->max[2]-tree->min[2])*0.5f;
00801 
00802     create_octree_node(tree, tree->root, mid, size, tree->refpoints, 0);
00803 
00804     MEM_freeN(tree->points);
00805     MEM_freeN(tree->refpoints);
00806     MEM_freeN(tree->tmppoints);
00807     tree->refpoints= NULL;
00808     tree->tmppoints= NULL;
00809     tree->points= newpoints;
00810     
00811     /* sum radiance at nodes */
00812     sum_radiance(tree, tree->root);
00813 }
00814 
00815 void scatter_tree_sample(ScatterTree *tree, float *co, float *color)
00816 {
00817     float sco[3];
00818 
00819     copy_v3_v3(sco, co);
00820     mul_v3_fl(sco, 1.0f/tree->scale);
00821 
00822     compute_radiance(tree, sco, color);
00823 }
00824 
00825 void scatter_tree_free(ScatterTree *tree)
00826 {
00827     if (tree->arena) BLI_memarena_free(tree->arena);
00828     if (tree->points) MEM_freeN(tree->points);
00829     if (tree->refpoints) MEM_freeN(tree->refpoints);
00830         
00831     MEM_freeN(tree);
00832 }
00833 
00834 /* Internal Renderer API */
00835 
00836 /* sss tree building */
00837 
00838 typedef struct SSSData {
00839     ScatterTree *tree;
00840     ScatterSettings *ss[3];
00841 } SSSData;
00842 
00843 typedef struct SSSPoints {
00844     struct SSSPoints *next, *prev;
00845 
00846     float (*co)[3];
00847     float (*color)[3];
00848     float *area;
00849     int totpoint;
00850 } SSSPoints;
00851 
00852 static void sss_create_tree_mat(Render *re, Material *mat)
00853 {
00854     SSSPoints *p;
00855     RenderResult *rr;
00856     ListBase points;
00857     float (*co)[3] = NULL, (*color)[3] = NULL, *area = NULL;
00858     int totpoint = 0, osa, osaflag, partsdone;
00859 
00860     if (re->test_break(re->tbh))
00861         return;
00862     
00863     points.first= points.last= NULL;
00864 
00865     /* TODO: this is getting a bit ugly, copying all those variables and
00866      * setting them back, maybe we need to create our own Render? */
00867 
00868     /* do SSS preprocessing render */
00869     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
00870     rr= re->result;
00871     osa= re->osa;
00872     osaflag= re->r.mode & R_OSA;
00873     partsdone= re->i.partsdone;
00874 
00875     re->osa= 0;
00876     re->r.mode &= ~R_OSA;
00877     re->sss_points= &points;
00878     re->sss_mat= mat;
00879     re->i.partsdone= 0;
00880 
00881     if (!(re->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS))
00882         re->result= NULL;
00883     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
00884 
00885     RE_TileProcessor(re);
00886     
00887     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&re->resultmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
00888     if (!(re->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS)) {
00889         RE_FreeRenderResult(re->result);
00890         re->result= rr;
00891     }
00892     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&re->resultmutex);
00893 
00894     re->i.partsdone= partsdone;
00895     re->sss_mat= NULL;
00896     re->sss_points= NULL;
00897     re->osa= osa;
00898     if (osaflag) re->r.mode |= R_OSA;
00899 
00900     /* no points? no tree */
00901     if (!points.first)
00902         return;
00903 
00904     /* merge points together into a single buffer */
00905     if (!re->test_break(re->tbh)) {
00906         for (totpoint=0, p=points.first; p; p=p->next)
00907             totpoint += p->totpoint;
00908         
00909         co= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*co)*totpoint, "SSSCo");
00910         color= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*color)*totpoint, "SSSColor");
00911         area= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*area)*totpoint, "SSSArea");
00912 
00913         for (totpoint=0, p=points.first; p; p=p->next) {
00914             memcpy(co+totpoint, p->co, sizeof(*co)*p->totpoint);
00915             memcpy(color+totpoint, p->color, sizeof(*color)*p->totpoint);
00916             memcpy(area+totpoint, p->area, sizeof(*area)*p->totpoint);
00917             totpoint += p->totpoint;
00918         }
00919     }
00920 
00921     /* free points */
00922     for (p=points.first; p; p=p->next) {
00923         MEM_freeN(p->co);
00924         MEM_freeN(p->color);
00925         MEM_freeN(p->area);
00926     }
00927     BLI_freelistN(&points);
00928 
00929     /* build tree */
00930     if (!re->test_break(re->tbh)) {
00931         SSSData *sss= MEM_callocN(sizeof(*sss), "SSSData");
00932         float ior= mat->sss_ior, cfac= mat->sss_colfac;
00933         float *radius= mat->sss_radius;
00934         float fw= mat->sss_front, bw= mat->sss_back;
00935         float error = mat->sss_error;
00936 
00937         error= get_render_aosss_error(&re->r, error);
00938         if ((re->r.scemode & R_PREVIEWBUTS) && error < 0.5f)
00939             error= 0.5f;
00940         
00941         sss->ss[0]= scatter_settings_new(mat->sss_col[0], radius[0], ior, cfac, fw, bw);
00942         sss->ss[1]= scatter_settings_new(mat->sss_col[1], radius[1], ior, cfac, fw, bw);
00943         sss->ss[2]= scatter_settings_new(mat->sss_col[2], radius[2], ior, cfac, fw, bw);
00944         sss->tree= scatter_tree_new(sss->ss, mat->sss_scale, error,
00945             co, color, area, totpoint);
00946 
00947         MEM_freeN(co);
00948         MEM_freeN(color);
00949         MEM_freeN(area);
00950 
00951         scatter_tree_build(sss->tree);
00952 
00953         BLI_ghash_insert(re->sss_hash, mat, sss);
00954     }
00955     else {
00956         if (co) MEM_freeN(co);
00957         if (color) MEM_freeN(color);
00958         if (area) MEM_freeN(area);
00959     }
00960 }
00961 
00962 void sss_add_points(Render *re, float (*co)[3], float (*color)[3], float *area, int totpoint)
00963 {
00964     SSSPoints *p;
00965     
00966     if (totpoint > 0) {
00967         p= MEM_callocN(sizeof(SSSPoints), "SSSPoints");
00968 
00969         p->co= co;
00970         p->color= color;
00971         p->area= area;
00972         p->totpoint= totpoint;
00973 
00974         BLI_lock_thread(LOCK_CUSTOM1);
00975         BLI_addtail(re->sss_points, p);
00976         BLI_unlock_thread(LOCK_CUSTOM1);
00977     }
00978 }
00979 
00980 static void sss_free_tree(SSSData *sss)
00981 {
00982     scatter_tree_free(sss->tree);
00983     scatter_settings_free(sss->ss[0]);
00984     scatter_settings_free(sss->ss[1]);
00985     scatter_settings_free(sss->ss[2]);
00986     MEM_freeN(sss);
00987 }
00988 
00989 /* public functions */
00990 
00991 void make_sss_tree(Render *re)
00992 {
00993     Material *mat;
00994     
00995     re->sss_hash= BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "make_sss_tree gh");
00996 
00997     re->i.infostr= "SSS preprocessing";
00998     re->stats_draw(re->sdh, &re->i);
00999     
01000     for (mat= re->main->mat.first; mat; mat= mat->id.next)
01001         if (mat->id.us && (mat->flag & MA_IS_USED) && (mat->sss_flag & MA_DIFF_SSS))
01002             sss_create_tree_mat(re, mat);
01003     
01004     /* XXX preview exception */
01005     /* localizing preview render data is not fun for node trees :( */
01006     if (re->main!=G.main) {
01007         for (mat= G.main->mat.first; mat; mat= mat->id.next)
01008             if (mat->id.us && (mat->flag & MA_IS_USED) && (mat->sss_flag & MA_DIFF_SSS))
01009                 sss_create_tree_mat(re, mat);
01010     }
01011     
01012 }
01013 
01014 void free_sss(Render *re)
01015 {
01016     if (re->sss_hash) {
01017         GHashIterator *it= BLI_ghashIterator_new(re->sss_hash);
01018 
01019         while (!BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(it)) {
01020             sss_free_tree(BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(it));
01021             BLI_ghashIterator_step(it);
01022         }
01023 
01024         BLI_ghashIterator_free(it);
01025         BLI_ghash_free(re->sss_hash, NULL, NULL);
01026         re->sss_hash= NULL;
01027     }
01028 }
01029 
01030 int sample_sss(Render *re, Material *mat, float *co, float *color)
01031 {
01032     if (re->sss_hash) {
01033         SSSData *sss= BLI_ghash_lookup(re->sss_hash, mat);
01034 
01035         if (sss) {
01036             scatter_tree_sample(sss->tree, co, color);
01037             return 1;
01038         }
01039         else {
01040             color[0]= 0.0f;
01041             color[1]= 0.0f;
01042             color[2]= 0.0f;
01043         }
01044     }
01045 
01046     return 0;
01047 }
01048 
01049 int sss_pass_done(struct Render *re, struct Material *mat)
01050 {
01051     return ((re->flag & R_BAKING) || !(re->r.mode & R_SSS) || (re->sss_hash && BLI_ghash_lookup(re->sss_hash, mat)));
01052 }
